content:encoded:
This week on Case Closed, we begin with No Sad Clown For Me, the June 25, 1950, episode of Jeff Regan, Investigator.

(30:13) Our second episode comes from Barrie Craig, Confidential Investigator. We’ll hear Ghost Of A Chance, his story from December 19, 1951.

Download CaseClosed745

Case Closed is made possible by your support. If you’d like to help out, visit donate.relicradio.com for more information. Thank you!
